pullRequest.title: [#1441] Make hard-coded event bus send timeout configurable.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR is intended for the issue #1441.
The hard-coded send time out value can now be configured.

nodes.bodyText: does it make sense to set this to 0?

beforeCommit.message:
[#1441] Make hardcoded event bus send timeout configurable.

 This timeout value is used when sending a message on the vert.x event bus.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <Kartheeswaran.Kalidass@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: no need to deprecate this anymore, since it is private API now ...
